direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well what about those bruises on his neck?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody did that to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think he did it to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!  No, that's not possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wendy, once you rule out his version of what happened, there is no other explanation - is there? It wouldn't be that different from the episode that he had before we came up here, would it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack, whatever the explanation is,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we have to get Danny out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him out of here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean just leave the hotel?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. DANNY'S BEDROOM - M.C.S. DANNY with his mouth wide open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is so fucking typical of you to create a problem like this when I finally have a chance to accomplish something.  When I'm really into my work.  I could really write my own ticket if I went back to Boulder now, couldn't I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shovellings out driveways, work in a car wash - any of that appeal to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wendy, I have let you fuck up my life so far, but I'm not going to let you fuck this up! He starts to move away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . M.S. WENDY sitting on bed, starts to cry.  She leans forward and buries her face in her hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over phone) Good evening.  Forest Service.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Hallo.  My name's Dick Halloran. I'm the Head Chef up at the Overlook Hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over phone) Good evening, Mr. Halloran.  What can I do for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Sir, I've been trying to make an urgent phone call up there, He picks up phone and walks R-L to window.  CAMERA PANS with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) but the operator said that the phone lines are down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. RANGER'S OFFICE - M.S. RANGER sitting at radio with phone to ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Yes, I'm afraid a lot of lines around here are down, due to the storm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Well, look sir, I hate to put you to any trouble, but there's a family up there all by themselves with a young kid, and with this storm and everything. HALLORAN moves L-R.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.  He puts phone on table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) I'd sure appreciate it if you'd give them a call on your radio just to see if everything is okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) I'd be glad to do that, sir.  Oh why don't you call me back in about eh twenty minutes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over phone) Thank you very much.  I'll do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) All right, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RANGER puts phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, Mr. Torrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening. JACK moves L-R across crowded Ballroom - CAMERA TRACKS with him to LLOYD serving behind bar.  JACK sits at bar.  LLOYD moves to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi Lloyd.  I've been away.  Now I'm back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening Mr. Torrance. LLOYD puts dishes of olives and peanuts on bar before JACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's good to see you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's good to be back, Lloyd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'll it be, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hair of the dog that big me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . M.C.S. LLOYD LLOYD Bourbon on the rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll do her. JACK takes handful of peanuts and empties them into his mouth.  LLOYD puts ice into glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No charge to you, Mr. Torrance. JACK looks down at note and up to LLOYD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No charge?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your money's no good here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orders from the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . M.S. JACK over LLOYD.  JACK puts note back into his wallet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orders from the house. He puts wallet away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drink up, Mr. Torrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the kind of man likes to know who's buying their drinks, Lloyd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not a matter that concerns you, Mr. Torrance - at least not at this point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything you say, Lloyd.  Anything you say. JACK turns away from bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! GRADY staggers forward, colliding with JACK and spilling drinks down front of JACK's jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh dear, oh dear.  I'm so sorry, sir.  Oh! He puts down tray and takes advocaat glass from JACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh dear oh dear... I've made an awful mess of your jacket, sir. GRADY puts glass on tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh eh that's all right.  I've got plenty of jackets. GRADY mops JACK's jacket with his serviette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid it's advocaat sir.  It tends to stain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Advocaat is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes sir.  Look um... I think the best thing is to come along to the gentlemen's room, sir, and eh... GRADY bends down and picks up his tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: we'll get some water to it, sir. JACK & GRADY start to walk away to the Gentlemen's.  CAMERA TRACKS after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks as though you might have got a spot of it on yourself there, Jeevesy old boy. JACK pats GRADY on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That doesn't matter, sir.  You're the important one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awfully nice of you to say.  Of course I intend to change my jacket this evening before the fish and goose soiree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JACK & GRADY enter Gentlemen's Toilet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very wise, sir.  Very wise. JACK exits cam.R behind door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, I'll just, eh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hold this for you there, Jeevesy. GRADY enters cam.L.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, sir.  Thank you. GRADY walks forward and puts his tray down on basins cam.R. JACK walks forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now let's see if we can improve this with a little water, sir. GRADY soaks his serviette under tap.  JACK puts glass down cam.L and turns to GRADY cam.R.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right, I'll just set my bourbon and advocaat down right there. JACK laughs.  GRADY starts to sponge JACK with serviette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Won't keep you a moment, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. GRADY sponges JACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do they call you around here, Jeevesy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grady, sir.  Delbert Grady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grady?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Delbert Grady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right, sir. GRADY sponges JACK's trousers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh, Mr. Grady... JACK clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: haven't I seen you somewhere before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why no, sir.  I don't believe so. GRADY turns cam.L to basins to rinse serviette under tap. He turns back to JACK and sponges his jacket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah ha, it's coming off now, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh... Mr. Grady... weren't you once the caretaker here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why no, sir.  I don't believe so. GRADY sponges JACK's trousers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You er a married man, are you, Mr. Grady? GRADY sponges JACK's jacket sleeve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir.  I have a wife and eh two daughters, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, er... where are they now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, they're somewhere around.  I'm not quite sure at the moment, sir. JACK takes serviette away from GRADY and wipes his hand with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Grady, you were the caretaker here.  I recognize you.  I saw your picture in the newspapers.  You eh... chopped your wife and daughters up into little bits, and eh... and you blew your brains out. JACK throws serviette into basin cam.L.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's strange, sir.  I don't have any recollection of that at all. Mr. Grady, you were the caretaker here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry to differ with you, sir, but you are the caretaker.  You have always been the caretaker, I should know, sir.  I've always been here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you know, Mr. Torrance, that your son... is attempting to bring an outside party into this situation? Did you know that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is, Mr. Torrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A nigger.

direction.raw_text: A nigger!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A nigger cook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your son has a very great talent. I don't think you are aware how great it is, but he is attempting to use that very talent against your will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, he is a very willful boy. JACK smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indeed, he is, Mr. Torrance.  A very willful boy.  A rather naughty boy, if I may be so bold, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's his mother. JACK looks about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She eh... interferes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps they need a good talking to, if you don't mind my saying so. Perhaps a bit more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . M.C.S. JACK.

direction.raw_text: My girls, sir, they didn't care for the Overlook at first.  One of them actually stole a packet of matches
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and tried to burn it down.  But I corrected them, sir.  And when my wife tried to prevent me from doing my duty I corrected her.

direction.raw_text: (to herself) We have the Snowcat.  If the weather breaks, we might just be able to get down the mountain in that. WENDY turns and walks L-R back into LIVING ROOM - CAMERA TRACKS IN and PANS with her.

direction.raw_text: (to herself) I could call the Forest Rangers first and then tell them that we're coming so that they could start searching for us, in case we didn't make it. WENDY turns and walks R-L into Bedroom - CAMERA PANS with her.

direction.raw_text: (to herself) If Jack won't come with us, we'll just have to tell him that we are going by ourselves.  That's all there is to it.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Oh, that's very nice of you.  I'll call you back later.  Bye. He walks L-R.  CAMERA TRACKS & PANS with him.  He puts phone down on receiver, and puts his hand up to his head.

direction.raw_text: (into phone) I'm not in Florida, Larry.  I'm calling from Stapleton Airport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. DURKIN'S GARAGE - M.S. DURKIN, phone to ear, leaning on counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) What the hell are you doing down there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Well, I just got in from Miami, and I've got to get up to the Overlook today.  What's the weather like up there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Well, the snow ploughs are keeping things moving in town, but the mountain roads are completely blocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) That means I'm going to need a snowcat to get up there, Larry. Can you fix me up with one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) What's the big deal about getting up there today, especially in this kind of weather?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Larry, just between you and me, we've got a very serious problem with the people who are taking care of the place.  They've turned out to be completely unreliable assholes. Ullman phoned me last night, and I'm supposed to go up there and find out if they have to be replaced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) How long is it going to take you to get up here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Oh about five hours.  I'm gonna rent a car here at the airport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Okay, Dick - I'll take care of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) Oh thanks a lot, Larry.  I really appreciate that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into phone) That's all right.  Drive carefully. He puts phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, good morning to you, Hal and Charlie on Radio 63, KHOW Denver

Yeah, they're just not prepared. dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK, lying on his back on the floor GROANING, starts to come to.  His eyes open and he lifts his head up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY, tugging at door handle.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY's hand on handle.  She takes out pin on chain in handle and tugs handle open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY swings door open.  Then she takes hold of JACK's ankles.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY pulling JACK by the legs into food store.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. High Angle JACK on his back being dragged through door into food store.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Low Angle WENDY's feet and legs move forward from JACK - She exits cam.R.f.g.  JACK rolls over onto his elbow. Door closes in f.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK on floor in f.g.  WENDY in b.g. closes the door. JACK gets onto his feet.  He GROANS and grips his R. ankle, staggering against cardboard boxes.  They fall down onto him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL KITCHEN - M.S. WENDY puts pin in handle, and backs L-R away from door. CAMERA PANS with her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - KITCHEN - M.S. WENDY kneeling by table.  She is weeping and puts her hand up to her head.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. FOOD STORE ROOM - M.C.S. Low Angle JACK listens to her weeping.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. KITCHEN - M.S. WENDY weeping as she kneels by table.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. FOOD STORE ROOM - M.C.S. JACK
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. KITCHEN - M.S. WENDY weeping turns to food store door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. FOOD STORE ROOM - M.C.S. JACK smiling.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. FOOD STORE ROOM - M.C.S. JACK laughing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - CORRIDOR - M.L.S. WENDY carrying knife runs forward - CAMERA PANS L-R with her as she runs to door.  She forces it open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.L.S. WENDY forces door open against snow and walks out on snow. CAMERA PANS L-R with her to edge of porch.  She runs away to b.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. WENDY runs L-R along front of hotel - CAMERA TRACKS with her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : BLACK FRAMES. Superimposed over: 4 p.m.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - L.S. Overlook Hotel in b.g.  Snow and trees in f.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - FOOD STORE ROOM - M.C.S. JACK asleep on sacks.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK.  KNOCK ON DOOR OFF.  JACK stirs and rubs his eyes.  KNOCK ON DOOR OFF. Jack sits up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK by door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. ROAD - NIGHT - L.S. HALLORAN driving Snowcat forward along snow-covered road between banks of trees.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HALLORAN'S SNOWCAT - M.C.S. HALLORAN driving Snowcat L-R along road.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Shooting from behind HALLORAN sitting cam.L through windscreen, with wipers working, as he moves forward along snow-covered road.  Trees on either side of road.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - JACK'S APARTMENT - NIGHT - M.C.S. DANNY moves away R-L towards his MOTHER asleep in bed. CAMERA PANS with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY beside WENDY in bed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY shrieks and looks cam.L.  She puts her hand up to DANNY's head.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - CORRIDOR - M.S. JACK swings axe at front door of his apartment.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. JACK'S APARTMENT - M.S. WENDY holding DANNY in her arms gets up off bed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - CORRIDOR - M.S. JACK swings axe at front door of apartment.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. JACK'S APARTMENT - M.S. WENDY, with DANNY in her arms, looks about, then moves to door with "MURDER" in reverse written on it.  She opens door and goes into bathroom, with DANNY, closing door behind her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY, with DANNY clinging to her, closes the door.  Then she bolts and locks it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - M.S. JACK swings axe at door and splinters a panel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY & DANNY move R-L from door to window.  She drops knife in basin as she passes it.  CAMERA PANS with them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. WENDY tries to force bottom part of window higher up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.C.S. DANNY clinging to WENDY looks over his shoulder as he hears axe splintering door OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - M.S. JACK swings axe at splintered panel on door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL BATHROOM WINDOW - M.S. WENDY looking out of window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : L.S. HOTEL.  WENDY at bathroom window.  She draws back into bathroom.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - M.S. JACK swings axe at splintered panel on door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. JACK'S APARTMENT - M.S. JACK pulls piece of wood away from splintered panel, and looks through gap.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK at gap in panel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY, back to camera, lifts DANNY up to open window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - L.S. WENDY pushes DANNY out through open window onto snow.  She lets him go and he slides L-R down snow.  He stands up at the bottom, and looks up at WENDY at window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY struggling to get out of open window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. JACK'S APARTMENT - M.S. JACK, carrying axe, moves up stairs from open front door. CAMERA TRACKS BACK with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. WENDY struggling to get out of bathroom window.  She goes back into bathroom.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY looking up cam.L at bathroom window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. JACK'S APARTMENT - BEDROOM - M.S. JACK, carrying axe, walks away across Living Room into Bedroom.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. WENDY tries to get out of open window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.C.S. JACK enters cam.R.  He stops at Bathroom door.  HE RAPS ON DOOR.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. WENDY with head out of open Bathroom window.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : L.S. WENDY at Bathroom window cam.L.  DANNY at foot of slope of snow looking up cam.L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.C.S. JACK at Bathroom door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY by open window.  She moves L-R to basin.  CAMERA PANS with her.  She picks up knife and moves R-L to side of door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.C.S. JACK at Bathroom door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK holding axe back to camera at Bathroom door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK swings axe twice at Bathroom door.  WENDY SCREAMS OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY standing at side of door.  JACK's axe appear through door.  WENDY SCREAMS.  JACK's axe repeatedly appears and splinters door.  WENDY screams.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. Splintered door panel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.S. JACK swings axe at splintered door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.C.S. JACK's face at gap in splintered door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY holding knife SCREAMS.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK's smiling face at gap in splintered door.  He moves backwards and reaches in through gap.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK's hand in through gap in door to key on inside of door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY strikes down with knife.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK's hand on key.  WENDY's knife slashes across back of his hand, and withdraws cam.R.  JACK's hand moves to gap in door.  JACK YELLS OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. ROAD - NIGHT - M.S. Shooting from behind HALLORAN sitting back to camera L.f.g. through windscreen as he drives along snow-covered road.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY at side of door.  She looks cam.R as she hears HALLORAN's Snowcat approaching OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.C.S. JACK at Bathroom door - he turns round as he hears HALLORAN's Snowcat approaching OFF.  He looks down cam.L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - NIGHT - L.S. HALLORAN's Snowcat moves R-L along snow-covered road. CAMERA TRACKS with it revealing Overlook Hotel in b.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BEDROOM - M.C.S. JACK looking cam.R.  He turns away to splintered door. SOUND OF SNOWCAT OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.C.S. WENDY at side of door listening.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - L.S. HALLORAN's Snowcat moves R-L along front of Hotel.  CAMERA TRACKS with it.  Snowcat stops.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY in oven slides door R-L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Oven door sliding L-R.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK holding axe limps R-L through kitchen.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. BATHROOM - M.S. WENDY sobbing at side of door - then she moves to door and slashes at it with knife.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.L.S. HALLORAN walking R-L.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.  He moves to door left open by WENDY.  He pulls it open wide and exits into Hotel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - LOBBY - M.S. JACK holding axe moves forward - CAMERA PANS R-L and TRACKS with him.  He moves away up stairs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. HALLORAN moves forward along corridor.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK YELLING as he swings axe at HALLORAN.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. HALLORAN's chest - axe pierces raincoat and blood oozes out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK over HALLORAN.  JACK holding onto shaft of axe.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. HALLORAN, with his mouth wide open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. HALLORAN, with his mouth wide open, sinks down out of shot.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY, with his mouth wide open.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK rises up into shot.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK holding axe standing beside body of HALLORAN on floor.  JACK limps forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK back to camera in R.f.g.  DANNY climbs out of oven in b.g.  JACK moves forward.  DANNY exits cam.R.f.g. JACK limps away.  CAMERA TRACKS IN after him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - STAIRS - M.S. High Angle WENDY runs up stairs L-R.  She pauses on landing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. WENDY'S P.O.V.  Shooting along landing into open doorway of bedroom.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY, holding knife, at top of stairs backs away - then turns and runs away along corridor, exiting cam.L at end.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. LOBBY - M.L.S. JACK, holding axe, limps forward and moves L-R through entrance.  He walks away to open door.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.  He stops in doorway.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. OVERLOOK HOTEL - NIGHT - M.L.S. Shooting from door.  HALLORAN's Snowcat in b.g.  CAMERA PANS L-R.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - LOBBY - M.S. JACK, holding axe, at open doorway.  He comes in and moves L-R to switch panel on wall.  He opens cover and presses switches down.  He leans towards open doorway and watches lights going on outside.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. DANNY crouched behind track of HALLORAN's Snowcat.  He peers round corner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. JACK limps to open doorway and stops.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK limps away from door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY runs L-R and exits cam.R.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK limping L-R from Hotel.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. DANNY running away L-R across snow.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He runs into Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK limping L-R.  CAMERA TRACKS with him.  Hotel in b.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. DANNY running away through Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him. He looks back over his shoulder.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK in the Maze.  He limps forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY's footprints in snow.  CAMERA TILTS UP & TRACKS FORWARD along DANNY's footprints.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - M.L.S. WENDY, carrying knife, runs forward into kitchen.  She looks towards stairs in b.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY reacts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. HALLORAN's body lying on floor.  CAMERA ZOOMS IN on it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY looks about.  She moves away R-L.  CAMERA PANS with her.  She SCREAMS and turns to cam.R.  CAMERA WHIP PANS L-R onto M.L.S. INJURED GUEST.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. WENDY reacting - knife trembles in her hand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. INJURED GUEST, with scar running down his head and face.  He raises glass he is holding.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.L.S. DANNY running away through Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK limps forward in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - CORRIDOR & LOUNGE - M.L.S. WENDY runs forward.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY looking about.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. SKELETONS sitting in chairs.  Bottle of champagne on table in f.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. SKELETONS sitting at table with bottle and glasses on it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. SKELETONS sitting in chairs round tables with bottles on them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY steps backwards in his footprints in snow.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK limps forward laughing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. DANNY stepping backwards in his footprints in snow. He jumps L-R landing in snow, and crawls L-R - brushing his traces in the snow out with his hands.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - CORRIDOR - M.L.S. WENDY holding knife runs forward.  She slows down as she nears f.g.  She moves R-L.  CAMERA PANS with her to open door.  She stops by doorway and looks along corridor towards lift doors in b.g.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Lift doors.  Blood gushes in cam.L and surges forward along floor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. WENDY reacts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Lift doors.  Blood gushes in cam.L and cam.R - surging forward in wave towards camera.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. DANNY sitting leaning against side of Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS R-L revealing JACK, holding axe, cam.R.b.g.  He limps R-L and moves away along Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. JACK - he looks about then back and forwards - and finally cam.R.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.C.S. DANNY crouched against side of Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK - he looks about then cam.L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK limps L-R and exits cam.R.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY appears from behind mound of snow and moves forward R-L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. DANNY's P.O.V.  Empty Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY moves away R-L from mound of snow.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He runs away along Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. Footprints in snow in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD along footprints.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. JACK limps forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK before him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD along Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.S. DANNY runs forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK moves to opening cam.R.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD - he turns and moves R-L to opening cam.L.  CAMERA PANS with him.  He stops and turns - then moves L-R.  CAMERA PANS with him and TRACKS after him as he limps along MAZE.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.L.S. WENDY sobbing and holding knife runs away to HALLORAN's Snowcat in b.g.  CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD after her.  She stops by Snowcat and looks about.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. DANNY runs forward in Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK.  DANNY looks over his shoulder and falls down in snow at entrance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.S. WENDY standing by HALLORAN's Snowcat.  She throws down knife.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. DANNY lying on snow at entrance to Maze.  He gets up and runs R-L.  CAMERA PANS with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. JACK holding axe limps forward - CAMERA TRACKS BACK.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - M.L.S. WENDY holding DANNY moves R-L to HALLORAN's Snowcat.  CAMERA PANS with them.  WENDY opens door of Snowcat and lifts DANNY up to cab.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.L.S. JACK GROANING staggers away along Maze - CAMERA TRACKS after him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - L.S. Snowcat with lights on moves R-L in front of Hotel, then turns to cam.R.  JACK SHOUTS INAUDIBLE OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. JACK staggers forward.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK - INDISTINCT SHOUTS.  He GROANS as he moves forward R-L.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - L.S. Snowcat drives away down road.  JACK INAUDIBLE SHOUTS OFF.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - M.S. JACK staggers forward along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS BACK - INDISTINCT MOANS & GROANS.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : M.L.S. JACK staggers away along Maze.  CAMERA TRACKS after him.  INDISTINCT MOANS.  He slumps down cam.L against side of Maze.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT. HOTEL - MAZE - DAY - M.C.S. JACK sitting up to his chest in snow dead.  Snow and icicles on his face.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. HOTEL - GOLD BALLROOM - M.L.S. Entrance to Gold Ballroom - CAMERA TRACKS FORWARD through entrance to photographs on wall.  CAMERA TRACKS IN close on photograph of Guests at Ball.
dialogue.name: dialogue
